attributes.additional_details: One person who stood up for gingers took the brunt of the force and was bullied relentlessly online. If gingers were a race this wouldn't of happend this link to a YouTube video counts as evidence and a reference since in the comments the person was attacked. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EY39fkmqKBM
attributes.background: For a long time we gingers were bullied in school and on the internet, this hate crime needs to stop. We should have an official declared race to protect us from these disturbing, disrespectful and violent acts against us.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you mean by "make gingers an official race". 

If you'd like the law to be changed, to include protections against discrimination because of hair colour, you could start a new petition asking for that.
